sentences.english: Compare the two values we found that they are anastomose essentially.
sentences.chinese: 實驗室試驗數據與仿真結果比較，二者基本吻合。

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草無性系各分株的發育時間基本相同。

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 許多最基本的職場失誤會讓他們摔跟頭，這讓我困惑。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 醫療服務合同具有委託合同的基本屬性。

sentences.english: This is basically a one-step operation.
sentences.chinese: 這基本上是一個單步操作。

sentences.english: Yeah, well, I'm actually in basic training at the minute.
sentences.chinese: 其實我現在就在接受基本的訓練。

sentences.english: S. joint communiques and the fundamental norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 它違背《中美三個聯合公報》和基本的國際關係準則。

sentences.english: My system is whatever's inside the box.
The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷達能量回程測繪形式是基本反射率圖。

sentences.english: He had troubles with the very elements of writing.
sentences.chinese: 他在掌握寫作的基本要領方面困難重重。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 區位理論是現代經濟地理學基本理論的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理與家用的空氣淨化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: At last, the basic principle of wide-range temperature operation and automatic temperature control system are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對寬溫工作的基本方法和自動控制系統給予了分析。

sentences.english: The basic structure of the Ice and Fire books is familiar enough.
sentences.chinese: 《冰與火之歌》的基本脈絡大家一定都很熟悉了。

sentences.english: Bentham sums up two principles that are applicable to penalty.
sentences.chinese: 邊沁歸納出了刑罰適用的兩個基本原則。

sentences.english: The testing results of the fabric are essentially satisfactory in wearability.
sentences.chinese: 並經織物服用性能測試，基本達到滿意的效果。
